description: Half-Immortal Yang Tian faced off against 9 Half-Immortals for his vengeance. While he succeeded, he sustained critical injuries and returned to Earth for his final resting place. However he managed to break through to True Immortal and his temperament returns to that of a young man. He just wants to have a lot of wives and live a quiet life. However, trouble always comes knocking.>
